• Class GestionnaireAPI

    This Class manage The used API, which means, it takes care of mananing :

    • Calls, making exchange with api using url's (network)
    • Processing Received Data, after calling url to get Data, this received data should be managed
    • Calls, making exchagne with api

      • getJSON

        public java.lang.String getJSON()
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                org.json.JSONException
        This method calls the API according to the url specified and the criteria (class parameters) using HTTP calls
        Returns:
        Type String(JSON), API's response
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of failling to read response from BufferedReader
        org.json.JSONException - when the json is not well organised, or an error occurs

      • headerJson

        public java.lang.String headerJson(java.lang.String urlPage,
                                   java.lang.String qId)
                            throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException,
                                   org.json.JSONException
        This method returns the path of the search id for the json's Header. (Each entity /ID), it requires as a parameter the link to JSON
        Parameters:
        urlPage - Type String, contains the link of the JSON
        qId - Type String, search id (key)
        Returns:
        Type String, which is the id
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - when the json is not valid, syntax error
        org.json.JSONException - use of null as a name,use of numeric types not available to JSON, lookups using an out of range index or nonexistent name

      • labelAccess

        public java.lang.String labelAccess(java.lang.String entityData,
                                    java.lang.String r1,
                                    java.lang.String r2,
                                    java.lang.String r3)
                             throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException,
                                    org.json.JSONException
        This method List elements on hierarchy.(ex : description / fr / value)
        Parameters:
        entityData - Type String JSON's hierarchical level :
        r1 - Type String, stands for level 1 from root
        r2 - Type String, stands for level 2 from root
        r3 - Type String, stands for level 3 from root
        Returns:
        Type String
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - when the json is not valid, syntax error
        org.json.JSONException - use of null as a name,use of numeric types not available to JSON, lookups using an out of range index or nonexistent name
